#Text=Kurdzhali ( city )
#Text=Kardzhali , also Kurjali , Kurdjali , Karjali , Kardjali , Kardschali or Kurdzhali ( Bulgarian : Кърджали ) , is a city in The Rhodopes , Bulgaria .
#Text=Understand
#Text=The climate is somewhat similar to the Mediterranean countries which is n't surprising since it is only 35 miles from Greece and Turkey .
#Text=The landscape is one of mountains and forests of oak and pine .
#Text=The population of Kardzhali is mixed with 50 % Bulgarians and 50 % Turkish .
#Text=Both languages are spoken .
#Text=Get in
#Text=You can easily get to Kardzhali .
#Text=It is recommended that you arrive in Kardzhali by bus , as there are buses from most of the major Bulgarian cities .
#Text=From Greece you go to Komotini from where a well-developed road leads to Kardzhali .
#Text=See
#Text=The region around Kardzhali has numerous ancient sites .
#Text=Make sure to see the ancient city and fortress Perperikon , the temple and tomb at Tatul and the artificial astronomic cave near the village of Illinica .
#Text=There is n't much to see in city of Kardzhali .
#Text=Do n't miss to visit the local history museum , the fruit market and Kardzhali dam .
#Text=Perperikon .
#Text=The ancient Thracian town of Perperikon is located in the Eastern Rhodopes , about 15 km northeast of the Kardzhali on a 470 m high rocky hill , which is thought to have been a sacred place .
#Text=The village of Gorna Krepost ( " Upper Fortress " ) is located at the foot of the hill and the gold-bearing Perpereshka River flows near it .
#Text=Perperikon is the largest megalith ensemble in the Balkans .
#Text=It is thought that the famous Temple of Dionysius is located at this location .
#Text=Tatul .
#Text=The Thracian sanctuary is one of the most imposing megalithic monuments discovered on the territory of Bulgaria .
#Text=The sanctuary is a massive rock structure and its top is a truncated pyramid .
#Text=The complex comprises two sarcophagi , a rectangular bed for the main altar , and a three-metre-deep well .
#Text=It dates back to the end of the 5th and the beginning of the 4th centuries BC .
#Text=The Womb cave .
#Text=This Thracian megalith - The Womb Cave ( Cult complex “ Utroba cave ” Тракийско светилище Пещера Утроба ) is located near village of Ilinica .
#Text=The temple is shaped like the opening to a vagina .
#Text=It leads into a 22 m deep cave .
#Text=At the end of the cave , a carved altar ( 1.3 in height ) symbolises the womb itself .

#Text=At midday as the sun approaches its highest point , the sun light seeps into the cave through a special opening in the ceiling and projects a perfectly recognisable representation of a phallus onto the floor .
#Text=As the sun progresses further , and the light slants across the interior of the cave , the phallus grows longer , reaching out to the womb altar .
#Text=Only during some months of the year , when the sun is lowest on the horizon , the phallus becomes long enough to reach the altar and symbolically fecundate the womb .
#Text=A well marked tourist route exists through Enchec village and around 300m after mountain cottage “ Borovica ” .
#Text=The way to the cave includes around an hour of walking up .
#Text=The path is steep but with three big alcoves and a shelter right under the cleft of the cliff .
#Text=Local people know the place as Dangardak kaya ( The echoing stone ) .
#Text=Today childless couples visit the Womb cave to gain a long-awaited child .
#Text=Fotinovo Turtles .
#Text=Turtle-like reliefs , cut in the rocks by an ancient culture .
#Text=Largest is 7 by 5 m.
#Text=Do
#Text=Go to Kardzhali dam .
#Text=It is very high ( about 120 meters ) and it looks marvellous .
#Text=Buy
#Text=In the centre are three big supermarkets and many specialist shops .
#Text=Also the fruit market is worth visiting .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Be sure to try their Turkish Biurek ( Бюрек ) , which is something like Banitza .
#Text=Of course there are many good restaurants offering good food .
#Text=At least you can always go and eat a pizza .
#Text=In the dam lake there are also ship restaurants where customers can choose living fish for their meals .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=There are several hotels in Kardzhali where you can stay at night .
#Text=It is not expensive and the conditions are good .
#Text=Hotel Perperikon , 3 Volga Str . , ☏ +35936167140 .
#Text=3-star hotel
#Text=Hotel Restaurant IDA , 3 , Emanuıl Rangelov Str . , ☏ +35936181800 .
#Text=Hotel Arpezos , 46 Republikanska Str , ☏ +359885919605 .
#Text=Go next
#Text=in Greece
#Text=( Пловдив )
#Text=( Стара Загора ) .
#Text=Getting out is as easy as getting in Kardzhali .
#Text=There are about 15 buses leaving to Sofia , especially in the morning , so getting out is not a thing to worry about .
